function RYU_EP04_18()
    -- .転-4【12月第4週】「龍宮院ウランの願い」
    SaveData.Title = "龍宮院ウランの願い"

    -- //BG：男子部教室（夕方）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG015ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

PLAY_BGM("BGM02.wav")
PLAY_SE("SEf003.wav")
    -- //BU：モブ女子生徒×いっぱい
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MOB04aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,750,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_MOB05aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,450,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_MOB06aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(60,150,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(65,"BU_MOB07aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(65,-150,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(70,"BU_MOB08aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(70,-450,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(75,"BU_MOB10aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(75,-750,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

    -- //SE：騒ぐ声
--PLAY_SE("SEf003.wav")

    MSG([[ ――The day before the Princess Election. The pre-celebration in the boys’ club, now a tradition, had gathered more students than ever before. ]])


    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(65,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(70,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(75,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

    STOP_SE("SEf003.wav",1000)
    -- //BU：リラ（笑顔）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR07ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_1366.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 “Mask Senpai #1~, there aren’t enough chairs, come over here~” ]])

    -- //BU：リラ（笑顔）、１号（興奮）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR07ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,0,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_MA101ma")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,800,0)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(55,600,0,500,Ease.OutSine)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)


PLAY_VOICE("senpai1_0113.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Mask Senpai #1】
 “Yes, Lady Lira! I’m on my way yessssssss!” ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

    -- //BU：２号（通常）、３号（通常）、モブ女子生徒
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MOB06aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,600,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_MA201ma")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-600,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_MA301ma")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("meme_0017.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Tsudanuma Meme】
 “So, you’ll be coming as a lecturer for the art club, right!” ]])

PLAY_VOICE("senpai2_0085.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Mask Senpai #2】
 “If we’re good enough, we’re happy to help out as much as you like, de gozaru!” ]])

PLAY_VOICE("senpai3_0118.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Mask Senpai #3】
 “Well, I can draw too, but my specialty is video, ya know… heh heh. Let me read the script again sometime.” ]])

PLAY_VOICE("meme_0018.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Tsudanuma Meme】
 “Y-yes...! Please do!” ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

    -- //BU：オウガ（高笑い）、ヒユ（真剣）、モブ女子生徒×２
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MOB04aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,700,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_MOB05aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-700,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_OGA01pa")
    LAYER_POSITION(60,300,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(65,"BU_HIY01ba")
    LAYER_POSITION(65,-300,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0384.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Ouga】
 “Trying to take me on in Daifugō? That’s laughable! Kneel before the king’s luck!” ]])

PLAY_VOICE("kyohka_0035.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Kyoka Himekaido】
 “Ugh…! This guy is way too lucky!?” ]])

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0448.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】
 “But underestimating the unity of us ‘1-A Three Crows’ is the end of your luck! Activating ‘<r=イレブン>11</r> Back’!” ]])

PLAY_VOICE("reika_0033.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Reika Sakurajima】
 “And ‘Eight Cut’! Then simultaneously playing four sixes for a ‘Revolution’! Now the strength of the cards is reversed!” ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(65,"BU_HIY01ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(65,-300,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0449.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】
 “I saw right through you saving strong cards. You lose! The boys' club will be sent to buy the snacks!” ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(65,"")

STOP_BGM(2000)

    -- //BU：オウガ（笑顔）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG015be")
    LAYER_POSITION(LAYER_BG,-900,200)
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BUL_OGA01ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask013",500,false)

    -- //effect：オウガのBUアップ
PLAY_BGM("BGM20.wav")

PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0385.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Ouga】
 “Hmph, is that so?” ]])

    -- //CI：画面半分を覆うヒユの焦り顔 146
    -- //effect：ヒユのCIに押し出されるように、オウガのBUは端に移動。

    --LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    --LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_HIY01ga")
    --LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    --SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(LAYER_BG,-400,200,500,Ease.OutCubic)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,500,0,500,Ease.OutCubic)
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BG015be")
    LAYER_POSITION(60,-560,200)
    LAYER_LOAD(65,"BUL_HIY01ga")
    LAYER_POSITION(65,-1460,0)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(60,400,200,500,Ease.OutCubic)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(65,-500,0,500,Ease.OutCubic)
    LAYER_MASK(61,"frame01r",60,65)
    LAYER_POSITION(61,-960,0)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(61,0,0,500,Ease.OutCubic)
    WAIT(500)

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0450.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】
 “W-what!?” ]])

    -- -- //注釈：遊戯王のパロディです（https://www.nicovideo.jp/watch/sm12520045）

    -- //BU：オウガ（高笑い）、ヒユ（真剣）、モブ女子生徒×２
    --LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MOB04aa")
    --LAYER_POSITION(50,700,0)
    --LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_MOB05aa")
    --LAYER_POSITION(55,-700,0)
    --LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_OGA01pa")
    --LAYER_POSITION(60,300,0)
    --LAYER_LOAD(65,"BU_HIY01ba")
    --LAYER_POSITION(65,-300,0)

PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0386.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Ouga】
 “I anticipated you aiming for revolution. What I was holding back wasn’t just high-number cards, but a four-star combo that shatters petty schemes!” ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(65,"BUL_HIY01ga")
    LAYER_POSITION(65,-500,0)
PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0451.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】
 “One five card, two, three—f-four cards!?” ]])

PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0387.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Ouga】
 “Scatter before the king, revolutionaries! Activating ‘Revolution Counter’! The card strength returns to normal!” ]])

    LAYER_EFFECT(65,6,50,50,1000,false)

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0452.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】
 “Eeeeaaaaah!?” ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BUL_OGA01pa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,500,0,500)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask013",300,false)

PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0388.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Ouga】
 “Not ‘Three Crows’, but ‘Three Fools’ it seems! Ha—hahaha!!!” ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(65,"")
    LAYER_MASK(66,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG015ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

STOP_BGM(2000)
PLAY_BGM("BGM02.wav")

    -- //BU：エリカ（苦笑・汗）、ウラン（苦笑・汗）、モブ女子生徒
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU01fa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_MOB10aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0711.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 “If this keeps getting louder, I fear the teachers will scold us.” ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01fa")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1866.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 “Sorry everyone for the boys’ club being so noisy. But I think it just shows how comfortable everyone has become.” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0712.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 “Yes. Watching this, it really feels like the distance between the boys’ and girls’ clubs has shrunk a lot. Though strange for me to say, it almost feels like a lie about the feud a few months ago.” ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01aa")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1867.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 “That’s true. Ouga still keeps challenging the girls’ club to games as usual though.” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("sakuya_0031.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Sakuya Yuriikawa】
 “No, no. I’ve known Ouga since before, but right now he’s showing his best side.” ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1868.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 “R-really?” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("sakuya_0032.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Sakuya Yuriikawa】
 “Yeah. Before joining Yuriai, he was all work and no play, barely had any friends his age. Well, it was partly because he didn’t have anyone on the same wavelength either.” ]])

PLAY_VOICE("sakuya_0033.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Sakuya Yuriikawa】
 “He changed thanks to you, Princess Erika, and Minato. As a childhood friend, I want to say thanks on your behalf, thank you <sprite="Emoji" name="note">.” ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01fa")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1869.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 “It’s nothing like that. Ouga’s change surely comes from his own personality.” ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ea")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1870.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 “Minato and I were really encouraged by him too. We’re the ones who should be thanking him.” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("sakuya_0034.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Sakuya Yuriikawa】
 “Ah, seriously, he’s such a good kid... I’d even want him as my husband. Wanna come marry me after graduation? I’d really welcome you.” ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU01oa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0713.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 “Yes, indeed.” ]])

    MSG([[ Both of them looked seriously serious and it was scary. Especially Uran. ]])

    MSG([[ At that moment, I looked at the time shown on my phone and remembered it was time to switch with my <r=ミナト>True Face</r>. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1871.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 “Oh my, it’s already this late? I have to switch with Minato and help at home, so I’ll be going.” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("sakuya_0035.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Sakuya Yuriikawa】
 “Thanks for all your hard work. I wish I could see more of the cousin dynamic with Minato sometimes, but given the circumstances, I guess it’s unavoidable.” ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0714.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 “…That’s true. I’m glad I finally got to thank Minato directly, but I wish I could have talked to Erika a little more.” ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01fa")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1872.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 “You can talk to me anytime. From now on, anywhere, anytime.” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask001",1000,false)

    -- //BG：男子部校舎前（夜）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG021ca")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask001" , 1000,false)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask001",1000,false)

    MSG([[ After briefly wrapping up the conversation, I slipped out of the school building and headed toward the multipurpose restroom, holding my change of clothes. ]])

    -- //BG：メインストリート・冬（夜）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG019cc")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask001",1000,false)

    MSG([[ It’s problematic that Minato isn’t at the pre-party, but I don’t have time to go home and undo my crossdressing now. ]])

    MSG([[ So at gatherings like today, I usually undo my crossdressing in the multipurpose restroom and return to the venue in my true face, just like at the entrance ceremony. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01aa")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1873.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 “Alright, at this time... there’s no one here.” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ Watching carefully around, I tried to approach the bushes leading to the multipurpose restroom. ]])

    MSG([[ Then, at that moment―― ]])

STOP_BGM(1000)
PLAY_BGM("BGM09.wav")

    -- //BU：ウラン（通常）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,-200,0)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,0,0,500,Ease.OutSine)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0715.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 “Erika-san, this path leads to the sports field; do you have business there?” ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ga")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1874.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 “U-Uran-san!? Wh-why are you here!?” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0716.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 “Minato-san and Erika-san always swap conveniently… so I was a little concerned.” ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ga")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1875.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 “Eh!?” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ N-no way. They suspect we’re the same person...!? ]])

    MSG([[ How stupid am I. I haven’t grown at all since the incident visiting Marika’s hospital room. ]])

    MSG([[ I wonder how much Uran-san has seen. If she’s seen me exiting the multipurpose restroom after switching, I’m doomed. But still... ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ba")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1876.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 “U-Uran, do you know something about me and Minato?” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0717.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 “No, it’s still just speculation. But if my worries are correct... I would be hurt.” ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU01da")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0718.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 “That is why, trusting that I can dispel this fear… I gathered my courage to ask you directly.” ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1877.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 “Ask? What exactly would you ask...?” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    -- //SE： 心臓の音
PLAY_SE("SEa025.wav")
WAIT(500)

    MSG([[ My heart pounds rapidly. Greasy sweat slides down my cheeks and flows down my neck. ]])

    MSG([[ Then at last, Uran-san asked the core question―― ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU01ha")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

STOP_BGM(1000)
PLAY_VOICE("uran_0719.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 “E-Erika-san and Minato-san… a-are you two dating?” ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ha")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1878.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 “…What?” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ I was caught off guard by the unexpected question. ]])

PLAY_BGM("BGM02.wav")

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0720.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 “I-I'm sorry for such a strange question! But since you stubbornly never appear together…” ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0721.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 “I wondered if you might have a special relationship! I thought you might have been meeting Minato-san when you headed deeper into those bushes…” ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ha")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1879.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 “W-w-what are you saying!? Minato is my cousin! There’s no way that could be true!” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU01da")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0722.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 “Y-yes, I understand. But my thoughts kept going to the worst… Please forgive my nonsense.” ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0723.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 “S-so, truly, is there nothing happening with Minato-san...?” ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ba")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1880.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 “There’s nothing. There never has been, and never will be.” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ I am myself, so there’s nothing I could do even if I wanted to. This I can say with confidence. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01fa")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1881.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 “The reason I headed into those bushes was just to use that restroom. Sorry if it caused a strange misunderstanding.” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU01fa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0724.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 “Y-yeah, that’s more natural when you think about it. I’m sorry for my sudden worries.” ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU01da")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0725.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 “I tried not to think about it, but maybe my heart is a little weak right now.” ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01da")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1882.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 “…So you’re worried about tomorrow’s Princess Election.” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ Uran nodded. ]])

    MSG([[ Today, we tried not to mention it as much as possible, but our preparations for the Princess Election requests weren’t perfect. ]])

    MSG([[ Although we continued training in ‘martial arts’, the issue with Uran’s stamina remained unsolved. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU01aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0726.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 “The restorative meals Ouga and Erika prepared were delicious, but they don’t solve the root problem.” ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU01da")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0727.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 “I’m anxious whether Erika can fulfill the role she’s meant to take on. And now that Erika has left me... I...” ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01da")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1883.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 “Uran-san.” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ Uran, unusually, spoke with doubt. ]])

    MSG([[ Usually graceful, her admitting weakness now shows how serious things are. ]])

    MSG([[ To have her say this to me, ‘Erika Ikusa’, is a sign of trust. ]])

    MSG([[ If I can’t cheer her up now, then I’m no man. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ea")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1884.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 “I promise. I won’t leave your side, Uran-san.” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    --LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU01da")
    --SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0728.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 “R-really...? But today I followed you around without permission and asked disrespectful questions…” ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0729.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 “I’ll probably cause you trouble from now on too. Is that alright?” ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01fc")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1885.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 “It’s fine. In fact, I’d love to see the real Uran more often.” ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ea")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1886.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 “If you’re worried, I’ll make a promise for the Princess Election tomorrow.” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU01ca")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0730.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 “A-a promise?” ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ea")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1887.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 “Yes. Proof that I’ll stay by your side… A promise to push you forward when the Princess Election gets tough.” ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_1888.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 “If you win the Princess Election tomorrow, I’ll grant any one wish you make.” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU01ha")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0731.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 “A-any wish of mine...?” ]])

    MSG([[ Uran looked confused and tilted her head. ]])

    MSG([[ Meanwhile, I recalled Akira’s words about ‘living a life for yourself.’ ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01aa")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1889.wav")
